# [Lunch Picker][docs]

Lunch Picker is a Postman collection that acts as a restaurant discovery service, powered by the Yelp Fusion API.

[![Run in Postman][button]][run]

[button]: https://run.pstmn.io/button.svg "Run in Postman Button"
[docs]: https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/218543/lunch-picker/6fWy4Ao "Lunch Picker Documentation"
[run]: https://app.getpostman.com/run-collection/18f56d0892e624da67b7#?env%5BLunch%20Picker%20(Beta).template% "Run the Lunch Picker Collection in Postman"
